body: Now that I'm rereading this gem, I've never noticed that Akira never had sex with Mari(Riri's sister)

It was a pretty good manga👍
What I dont like is the fact we didnt see the sisters having their time together like the older sister and the blonde girl sandwiching the little sister. And also I'm not sure with the fact that Akira and Miu are ok with having sex with the other girls. I thought that after confessing they were gonna stopped from having sex with the other girls. It's just that I dont like cheating tho I could endure the times when they were "cheating" cause they were ok with zero drama. But still I would have preferred Miu and Akira doing between themselves only. Also I would really like to see more like an epilogue for example where Akira and Miu are living together like a couple as they are without the other girls of course. The two of them going out for a date, and more adult action... and why not a wedding(?) But anyway dont mind me cause that will never happened.
All I can say is that this manga is 👌 9/10
Pure, wholesome, Yuri, and poly. Can’t ask for much better!
A masterful display of polyamory and lewd yuri sex! It was an absolute pleasure to read this series <3
This was cute. Shame there wasn't an orgy at the end with all the girls.
